titles.title: Authorizing the placement of a bust of Raoul Wallenberg in the Capitol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Mr. Rose moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules. (CR H2377-2380)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 5, rule I, the chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 358 - 0 (Roll no. 114).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 466.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/11/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Joint Committee on the Library to accept and place a bust of Raoul Wallenberg in the Capitol.
